definitions.title: n.[m.] pl.
definitions.body: lattice or other opening through which one may look (Aram. [[חֲרַכָּא]] Targum Jos 2:15 al.=Heb. [[חַלּ֗וֹן]]; but NH [[חֲרָח]] is an opening smaller than a window)—only ´[[מֵחִיץ מִן־הַח]] Ct So 2:9 peeping in at the lattice (‖[[מַשְׁגִּיחַ מִן־הַחַלּֽנוֹת]]).
